snippet.title: Neptune short play and disk drive sound (Apple II - Gebelli Software)
snippet.description:
Neptune (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/neptune) was an action game published by Gebelli Software in 1982 for the Apple ][. The game was copy protected using quarter tracks and you can hear the amazing disk drive sound in the boot sequence. Hope you enjoy the short play!

PS: The # of lives and # of bombs are stored at address $87 and $88 respectively. Change $AC30 to A5 for infinite lives and change $2E25 to 00 for infinite bombs.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com (roughana)
Disk image - 4AM
